20110119143136.000|20110119143138.000|CC1|WAS AN  TENTH-GRADER WHO        
20110119143138.000|20110119143140.000|CC1|BROUGHT A.9 MM SEMIAUTOMATIC

20110119143149.000|20110119143151.000|CC1|YEAR-OLD GIRL HAD BEEN SHOT IN  
20110119143151.000|20110119143152.000|CC1|THE HEAD.
